_GEng_Sprite_AnimRewind: Reset the animation parameters of a Sprite Object
_GEng_Sprite_Animate: Animate a Sprite Object with a given Animation Object
_GEng_Sprite_AnimDelayMultiplierGet: Get the value of the Frame delay multiplier of a Sprite Object
_GEng_Sprite_AnimDelayMultiplierSet: Set the value of the Frame delay multiplier of a Sprite Object
